MajorClaims.MC1: online classes should never replace classroom learning
MajorClaims.MC2: the classroom learning is the best way to provide education for these reasons

Claims.C1: classroom learning is the best way to provide education comparing to online classes
Claims.C2: It makes you perfect in time management skills
Claims.C4: online classes have some advantages so they could be used as supplementary

Premises.P1: In the classroom environment you can learn from your classmates
Premises.P2: if you see any of your classmates who is performing better, it will force you for making your performance more better
Premises.P3: When I was in First Year in B Com, I was not serious in my study, but when I saw some of my friends who took better grades than me, it influenced me and I intended to do better in my subjects
Premises.P4: I got 1st rank in final exam
Premises.P5: in classroom learning you have to complete study work on time
Premises.P6: you can learn by participating in group studies how to communicate with others
Premises.P7: It makes you communication and of course your group skills better, which can help you in your future and career
Premises.P8: professors play vital role in classroom learning, most of them are specialists is their subjects, and they help you by giving valuable information and useful skills
Premises.P9: You can improve your skills by work under any professor; you can ask questions face to face, it will clear your doubts
Premises.P10: For Toefl IBT Coaching first I was depend on some online courses, but after 1 month I realized that I was wasting my time so I joined an institute for preparation of Toefl IBT, and in 1 month I felt that my English skills have been improving faster
Premises.P11: they could not be substitute of existing classroom learning
